name: 11th Edition of International Conference on Neurology and Neurological Disorders
content: The 11th Edition of the International Conference on Neurology and Neurological Disorders (Neurology 2025) will take place from June 5-7, 2025, in the historic city of Rome, Italy. This year's theme, "Frontiers of Neurology: Bridging Science, Medicine, and Technology," will explore cutting-edge advancements and interdisciplinary approaches in neurology. Neurology Conferences is designed as a hybrid event, offering both onsite and online participation to maximize global engagement. Attendees will have the opportunity to connect with leading experts, delve into innovative research, and discuss the latest trends in neurological science. Join Brain Conference in Rome or virtually to gain valuable insights, expand your professional network, and be part of transformative discussions shaping the future of neurology. Donâ€™t miss this chance to contribute to the ongoing evolution of neurological science and practice.
